Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ashava]{Ashava}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ashukharma]{Ashukharma}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Doloras]{Doloras}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Folgrit]{Folgrit}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Lady Jingxi]{Lady Jingxi}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Lymnieris]{Lymnieris}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sarenrae]{Sarenrae}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shelyn]{Shelyn}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Lost Prince]{The Lost Prince}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Tsukiyo]{Tsukiyo}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Share Burden]{Share Burden}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Font of Serenity]{Font of Serenity}

You ease mental burdens.
name: Repose Domain
